scripts.deploy:db:offline: cd infrastructure/ && docker compose up -d && scripts/create-table.sh
scripts.deploy:offline: npm run deploy:db:offline && npm run build:offline && cd infrastructure/ && npx cdk bootstrap && DEPLOYMENT_ENV=offline DYNAMO_DB_ENDPOINT=http://dynamodb-local:8000 npx cdk synth && sam local start-api -t ./cdk.out/TodoStack-offline.template.json --docker-network todo && cd ../
scripts.deploy:development: npm run build:development && cd infrastructure/ && npx cdk bootstrap && DEPLOYMENT_ENV=dev npx cdk deploy --require-approval=never && cd ../
scripts.deploy:production: npm run build:production && cd infrastructure/ && npx cdk bootstrap && DEPLOYMENT_ENV=prod npx cdk deploy --require-approval=never && cd ../
